title: S&P 500 Hits Record High on Thin Volume | The Close 12/23/2025
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are Zacks Investment Management’s Brian Mulberry, Novo Nordisk’s Mike Doustdar, Jefferies’ Brent Thill, Meredith Whitney Advisory Group’s Meredith Whitney, Robinhood Markets’ Steve Quirk, Moody’s Investors Service’s Atsi Sheth, ServiceNow’s Amit Zavery, Stew Leonard’s CEO Stew Leonard Jr., Logan Paul and Goldin’s Ken Goldin. (Source: Bloomberg)
